title: Subpart 921-3 - Extension, Postponement, Or Rescission Of Employment Loss
content:
Subpart 921-3 - Extension, Postponement, Or Rescission Of Employment Loss

State Regulations
§ 921-3.1 - Extension of a temporary layoff period
§ 921-3.2 - Postponement of a plant closing, mass layoff, relocation, or covered reduction in hours
§ 921-3.3 - Rescission of notice of a plant closing, mass layoff, relocation, or covered reduction in hours

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
